Summary: a star that was not a star
trends: There have been 9 other sightings in Lynnwood
There were no other sightings in Lynnwood on or around April 19th 2011
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting Detailswent outside to have a cigarette. was outside looking at the stars when i noticed one was moving. at first i thouhgt it was a satalite but then it was moving much faster than a satalite. then it started getting larger and larger then it was right above us and completely silent, very peaceful but it looked almost like it was jerking forawrd a bit , no flashing lights of any kind just a pure white star-like light it flew over our house and then as it went off into the distance and then it disappeared into the distance. we were able to pick the light up on our cell phone camera but due to it being a hand held device we were not able to pick up the movements of the craft and the video is quite shaky. we both just looked at eachother with total amazement and absolutly no explanation for what we just saw.
